title: "On the Bluff at Long Beach, at the Bathing Hour"
medium: Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper
description: Four women in foreground, drawn to beach by white flag announcing calm water, approach the steep wooden staircase that leads from the top of the high sand dunes known as the Bluff to the bathhouses on the wide beach below.  Others descending steps to beach in middle distance.
name: Print
